description: The Visual C++ Redistributable Packages install run-time components that are required to run applications that are developed by using Visual Studio 2013, on computers that don't have Visual Studio 2013 installed. These packages install run-time components of these libraries: C Runtime (CRT), Standard C++, ATL, MFC, C++ AMP, and OpenMP.
displayName: Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013
summary: Run-time components that are required to run C++ applications that are built by using Visual Studio 2013
author: Microsoft
